name: BigCompany: Skytopia
description:
City building has never been more entertaining! Build your city, produce goods, fabricate products and sell them in order to develop your town. Master exciting events as well as accomplish challenging science quest. The title of the greatest city tycoon of all times is awaiting. Are you the one?

BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS

The sky is no limit anymore! Build and design your city of dreams. Produce goods, fabricate products and trade the most valuable artifacts. Use your profits to upgrade and expand your city in the sky.
Build factories and stores as well as prestigious buildings and grace your city with stunning decorations. Become the most successful entrepreneur above the clouds!

MEET FAMOUS HISTORICAL CHARACTERS

Join forces with some of the most famous scientists to make the Skytopia vision come to life and pursue their dream of a floating city in the sky. It’s time to play your part in the new industrial revolution above the clouds. Meet famous scientists such as Nikola Tesla, Marie Curie, and even young Albert Einstein. Follow their path and get inspired by their greatest achievements.

MORE THAN JUST A CITY BUILDER

Success and achievements require celebrations. Discover amusement activities and take part in exciting events and missions. Organize a great parade to celebrate the latest invention, bet on the next human achievements or enjoy a Wild Wild West show. Are you ready for some entertainment?
Meet other entrepreneurs from all over the world. Surround yourself with the smart and wealthy, found a corporation, and share business strategies to grow your BigCompany.

MORE TOP GAME FEATURES

• BUILD the city of your dreams with plenty of buildings and decorations
• JOIN the community and meet pioneers worldwide
• PRODUCE goods and trade the most valuable products
• MANAGE realistic production cycles
• MEET famous historical scientist and discover their human achievements
• MASTER exciting quests and challenging events

Take your part in the sky of fortune. What are you waiting for? Let's get started! Play BigCompany: Skytopia now for free!

*This app is completely free to play. Additionally it offers optional in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.This game requires an internet connection.
